body.name: Wrangler Women's High Rise Unforgettable Skinny Jean
features: Fabric type 69% Cotton, 21% Polyester, 9% Rayon, 1% Spandex

HIGH RISE SKINNY. These skinnies sit slightly higher in the back for added coverage and feature a contoured waistband for less gapping. With signature construction that lifts for a flattering fit, this high rise jean is truly a head turner.
TIMELESS STYLE. Make a statement in high-quality skinny jeans inspired by the western lifestyle. Express your true, authentic self through timeless pieces by Wrangler.

FASHION FOR ALL. Available in sizes 0-18, these jeans are made to be loved by every body. Designed with an ageless mindset and authentic fabric with the perfect amount of stretch to make all body types feel confident.
EVERYDAY STAPLE. Designed for women on the go, these high-waisted skinny jeans deliver an effortless, tailored look to any ensemble. Pair with your favorite top and accessories for a polished outfit.

ICONIC FINISHES. These skinny jeans are finished with our iconic "W" stitching, leather Wrangler patch on the waistband, logo shanks and flat rivets. Maintain that effortless classic style with a touch of Wrangler heritage. Inseam: 28". Zipper fly.
body.description: Look no further than Wrangler for authentic, on-trend looks you'll feel good in. We took our most timeless styles and elevated them to fit the modern woman. Available in sizes 0 to 24, or XS to XXL, and made with the perfect amount of stretch, our styles are made to flatter every body. From tailored skinny jeans to fashionable denim jackets, complete your outfit with authentic statement pieces that express your true self.

productInformation.value: #27,252 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #241 in Women's Jeans

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: ***2022 update: Since I first ordered these jeans I’ve been working out and eating healthy and lost a decent amount of weight. I’m now 5’4” 120lbs so I re-ordered these jeans in size 2 and size 0. Size 2 fit perfectly everywhere else but gapped a little in the waist. Size 0 fit tight but stretched out with wearing perfectly. I absolutely love these jeans they are so flattering and comfortable. They hold up really well which is why I came back and repurchased them even after losing weight. I was initially unsure about these jeans but they have proven to be fantastic jeans. Below is my original review from before I lost weight and wore these in a size 6. I will continue to repurchase. They make your waist look so good! Definitely a true high rise jean.**original review**I’m 5’4” 135-140lbs and pear shape. I ordered my normal 27 that I normally wear in Levi’s and most jeans. They fit but are a little snug all over, particularly in the legs. They are nice jeans, they just didn’t “wow” me. I prefer my Levi’s. I gave them to my 13 year old daughter who is around 5’4” 128lbs (size 26-27 jeans in forever 21 and AE) and she likes them. She has a more straight figure. I would say the rise is on the higher side, they came right to my belly button. They have a decent amount of stretch. If I were to re-order I would go up one size to a 28 but like I said I won’t be re-ordering for myself. My daughter really likes them though and they look adorable on her. That’s the only purpose I would have to re-order these, if my daughter wants another pair. I found them to be really tight on my legs and my daughter doesn’t have as big of legs/butt/thighs as me so they work for her! My daughter is also short waisted and long legged (vs myself having short legs and long torso) so these come up a little higher on the waist for her. She prefers that so she can wear them as high waist jeans with a crop top so she doesn’t show mid drift.(pictures posted are of me wearing the jeans, not my daughter just FYI for reference purpose)**Update: welp I decided to give them another go and ordered myself a size 6! They fit really nice! My daughter kept telling me how much she loves them so I figured I would give them another try. I will say the size 6 is pretty prefect! Updated my rating to 5 star. (Pictures are of me in size 4, which felt to small, particularly in the bum and thighs.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy & versatile
reviews.reviewText: These fit great and are super comfy. They don't have a whole lot of stretch, which I'm really thankful for, because they don't get baggy and saggy by the end of the day. I'm 5' 3¾" & 132#. I wear size 4 in most things (or small if they don't go by # size) and these fit well, plus they are really comfy. They are a tad baggy in the waist, but nothing a belt couldn't handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good stretch, small in the waist
reviews.reviewText: First, I really love the wash and the cut of these jeans, and they're thick, stiffer denim that still has a decent stretch. I hate when I order jeans only to get what is basically leggings made of the thin stretchy fabric that passes for denim a lot of times these days. These are real jeans that should hold up nicely over time to thicker thighs.For reference, I'm 5'3" 230 lbs, pear shaped, and right now in size 18S in most brands. I had a baby, gained a lot of weight, then lost 120lbs in the past couple of years, so I have extra skin and a belly. 18 is also the size I was pre-pregnancy but I'm still learning what fits my body now. So, I wasn't positive these would fit after reading other reviews and I should have sized up.These fit like a glove in the legs and the butt and they stretch to accentuate your curves in a very flattering way. They're also true high rise, they come up just barely past my belly button, so they checked all the boxes for me except waist size. I feel like these jeans are meant to accentuate a pear shaped figure with a smaller waist. Unfortunately for me due to extra skin from weight loss and having a small apron belly from a c-section, sometimes clothes just don't fit me like they did before and these jeans are a bit too tight. I can button and zip them and they look fine with an oversized hoodie but if I tried to wear them with a fitted top right now it would look like I had two stomachs. I wore them for an entire day thinking maybe they'd loosen up over time but they held their shape all day, which is actually a great indicator of their quality but I just cant wear them right now lol. Comfort is important to me.I also recently bought a pair of Levi's 720 high rise super skinnys in 34S (18S) and they fit perfectly, like so perfect I think I've found my new favorite pair of jeans, but they were more expensive and the material isn't quite as stiff and nice as these Wranglers. These are slim enough in the legs that I think a 20 would still look good so I'm going to reorder but also keep the size 18 for future use. Like other reviews have said, if you're not absolutely sure about what size you need you definitely want to size up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wanted to love
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to love these jeans but couldn’t figure out my sizing that was good. I ordered what was suggested for sizing and what I thought made sense but when the jeans were delivered they just didn’t fit. Levi jeans are good quality and will last a lifetime if taken care. Just make sure to figure out your sizing before ordering!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The pants fit snug. The measurements was compared to a lee jeans. I will keep it however, I will have to wait until i reach goal weaight to fit properly in those. Hope to give a new review. It fit my 15yr fromthe hip down. Her waist is xxs so it won'f fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Wrangler Women's High Rise Unforgettable Skinny Jean is an absolute winner in my wardrobe. The fit is perfection – hugging in all the right places and sitting comfortably at the waist. The firm fitting design not only provides a flattering silhouette but also gives a confident feel. Speaking of confidence, these jeans are incredibly appealing on the booty, enhancing the overall look. Without a doubt, they've become my favorite pair of jeans. If you're in search of a combination of style, comfort, and a little boost of confidence, these Wrangler jeans are an excellent choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
reviews.reviewText: I was leery ordering Wrangler from Amazon but I will order again...I love these!! Will order a few more pairs..they fit true to size and I am very pleased!
